content.value:
Morning project was installing a bidet and my not-handy-in-any-way partner exclaims "wow how do you know how to do this?? Did you do this as a kid??"

Yes, clearly the obvious answer is not that I can read and execute instructions but that as a child I moonlighted as a plumber
